    • 方法详细资料

      • AddRoundKey

        public void AddRoundKey(int currentroundnum,
                        byte[][] state)
        Add round key to state with specific rule, just implement this on original state.
        参数:
        state - the 4x4 byte[][] state you want to add round key.

      • decryptstate

        public java.lang.String decryptstate(byte[][] state)
        Decrypt a block state.
        参数:
        state - the 4x4 byte[][] state you want to decrypt.
        返回:
        encrypted state.

      • InvMixColumns

        public byte[][] InvMixColumns(byte[][] state)
        Inverse mix every column of state with specific rule
        参数:
        state - the 4x4 byte[][] state you want to mix.
        返回:
        the mixed state

      • InvShiftRows

        public byte[][] InvShiftRows(byte[][] state)
        Inverse shift every row of state with specific rule,just implement this on original state.
        参数:
        state - the 4x4 byte[][] state you want to make inverse shifting rows.

      • InvSubBytes

        public void InvSubBytes(byte[][] state)
        do an inverse substitution using s_box.
        参数:
        state - the 4x4 byte[][] state you want to inverse substitute.

      • statetostring

        public java.lang.String statetostring(byte[][] state)
        transfer a byte[][] state to string type.
        参数:
        state - the 4x4 byte[][] state you want to transfer.
        返回:
        a string represent the state bytes
